00048 /*****************************************************************************\
00049  *
00050  *  File:  m_starcore.h
00051  *
00052  *  Description: Defines symbols used for reference in Mspec and code
00053  *              generator.
00054  *
00055  *  Authors: Christopher Shannon
00056  *  
00057 \*****************************************************************************/
00058 
00059 /*****************************************************************************\
00060  * NOTICE OF CONVENTION                                                      *
00061  * ------------------------------------------------------------------------- *
00062  * Mspec links to Pcode, Hcode, and Lcode modules.  In order to allow this   *
00063  * to take place without requiring front-end modules to link to liblcode.a,  *
00064  * Mspec code is divided into two classes as follows:                        *
00065  *  - mi_*.c must not depend on linkage to liblcode.a                        *
00066  *  - ml_*.c may depend on linkage to liblcode.a                             *
00067 \*****************************************************************************/
00068 
00069 #ifndef _M_STARCORE_H_
00070 #define _M_STARCORE_H_
00071 
00072 /* 10/29/02 REK Adding config.h */
00073 #include <config.h>
00074 #include  "m_spec.h"
00075 
00076 #define INT_MAX 0x7fffffff
00077 
00078 #define STARCORE_NUM_DATA_REG            (16)
00079 #define STARCORE_NUM_ADDR_REG            (16)
00080 #define STARCORE_NUM_PRED_REG            (2)
00081 #define STARCORE_NUM_START_ADDR_REG      (4)
00082 #define STARCORE_NUM_LOOP_COUNTER_REG    (4)
00083 #define STARCORE_NUM_ADDR_OFFSET_REG     (4)
00084 #define STARCORE_NUM_BASE_ADDR_REG       (8)
00085 #define STARCORE_NUM_MODULO_ADDR_REG     (4)
00086 
00087 #define STARCORE_MIN_REG_ID              (0)
00088 #define STARCORE_MAX_DATA_REG_ID         (STARCORE_NUM_DATA_REG-1)
00089 #define STARCORE_MAX_ADDR_REG_ID         (STARCORE_NUM_ADDR_REG-1+\
00090                                           M_STARCORE_ADDR_BASE)
00091 #define STARCORE_MAX_PRED_REG_ID         (STARCORE_NUM_PRED_REG-1)
00092 #define STARCORE_MAX_START_ADDR_REG_ID   (STARCORE_NUM_START_ADDR_REG-1)
00093 #define STARCORE_MAX_LOOP_COUNTER_REG_ID (STARCORE_NUM_LOOP_COUNTER_REG-1)
00094 #define STARCORE_MAX_ADDR_OFFSET_REG_ID  (STARCORE_NUM_ADDR_OFFSET_REG-1)
00095 #define STARCORE_MAX_BASE_ADDR_REG_ID    (STARCORE_NUM_BASE_ADDR_REG-1)
00096 #define STARCORE_MAX_MODULO_ADDR_REG_ID  (STARCORE_NUM_MODULO_ADDR_REG-1)
00097 
00098 /* Macro used in m_starcore.c and Lstarcore codegen */
00099 
00100 #define ADDR_ALIGN(addr, align) ( ((addr)+(align-1)) & ~(align-1) )
00101 
00102 /*
00103  * Declarations for processor models
00104  */
00105 
00106 enum
00107 {
00108   M_EM_SC140 = 0
00109 };
00110 
00111 
00112 #define EM_SC_MODEL_OK( model ) ( ( (model) == M_EM_SC140))
00113 
00114 enum
00115 {
00116   /* These need to be numbered starting after L_MAC_LAST in l_code.h
00117      since there is no way to distinguish between Lcode and machine specific
00118      macros. */
00119   STARCORE_MAC_SP = L_CODEGEN_START_VALUE,/* stack pointer                */
00120 
00121   STARCORE_MAC_LEAF,            /* 1 if leaf fn, 0 if not leaf function   */
00122   STARCORE_MAC_SYNC_SIZE,       /* size in bytes in LV space on stack     *
00123                                  * used to spill integers around syncs    *
00124                                  * such as setjmp                         */
00125   STARCORE_MAC_MEM_ALLOC,       /* total alloc space requirements         */
00126   STARCORE_MAC_TEMPLATE,
00127   STARCORE_MAC_LABEL,
00128 
00129   /* Application Registers - If these change, update application register
00130      macro check STARCORE_APPLICATION_MACRO( macro ).  These have been
00131      ordered by their application register number.*/
00132 
00133   STARCORE_MAC_NSP,             /* Normal Stack Pointer Register          */
00134   STARCORE_MAC_ESP,             /* Exception Stack Pointer Register       */
00135   STARCORE_MAC_PC,              /* Program Counter                        */
00136   STARCORE_MAC_MCTL,            /* Modifier Control Register              */
00137   STARCORE_MAC_SR,              /* Status Register                        */
00138   STARCORE_MAC_EMR,             /* Exception and Mode Register            */
00139   STARCORE_MAC_VBA,             /* Vector Base Address Register           */
00140   STARCORE_MAC_PCTL0,           /* PLL Control Register 0                 */
00141   STARCORE_MAC_PCTL1,           /* Clock Control Register 1               */
00142   STARCORE_MAC_T_BIT,           /* Represents the T-bit in the SR for     *
00143                                  * conditional execution                  */
00144   STARCORE_MAC_T_BIT_INV,       /* Represents the inverse of the T-bit    */
00145   STARCORE_MAC_TEMP             /* Will become r3 and is used for stack   *
00146                                  * adjustments after register allocation  */
00147 };
00148 
00149 #define STARCORE_APPLICATION_MACRO( m ) ((m->value.mac >= STARCORE_MAC_NSP)&& \
00150                                          (m->value.mac <= STARCORE_MAC_T_BIT))
00151 
00152 /*========================================================================*/
00153 /*
00154  *    StarCore parameter and return value offsets
00155  */
00156 /*========================================================================*/
00157 /* 
00158  * 
00159  * Data Registers          d
00160  * 
00161  * 2 input parameters      0-1
00162  * 1 return value          0 
00163  * 
00164  * Address Registers       r
00165  * 
00166  * 2 parameter registers   0-1
00167  * 1 return value          0
00168  * 
00169  */
00170 
00171 /* Number of scalar param registers */
00172 #define M_STARCORE_MAX_FNVAR_INT_REG     2
00173 
00174 /* Number of address param registers */
00175 #define M_STARCORE_MAX_FNVAR_ADDR_REG    2
00176 
00177 /* Number of return registers */
00178 #define M_STARCORE_MAX_RET_REG           1
00179 
00180 /* parameter registers */
00181 #define M_STARCORE_SMALL_STRUCT_MAX      2
00182 
00183 
00184 /* incoming and outgoing parameters */
00185 #define M_STARCORE_IN_INT_BASE           0      /* Int Registers     */
00186 #define M_STARCORE_OUT_INT_BASE          0      /* Int Registers     */
00187 #define M_STARCORE_IN_ADDR_BASE          2
00188 #define M_STARCORE_OUT_ADDR_BASE         2
00189 
00190 #define M_STARCORE_RET_INT_BASE          0      /* Non-stacked Int registers */
00191 
00192 #define M_STARCORE_ADDR_BASE            16      /* Address Registers         */
00193 
00194 #define M_STARCORE_LCODE_RET_INT         0
00195 #define M_STARCORE_LCODE_RET_ADDR        2
00196 #define M_STARCORE_LCODE_RET_ST         15
00197

00205 #define M_STARCORE_SIZE_VOID          0
00206 #define M_STARCORE_SIZE_BIT           1
00207 #define M_STARCORE_SIZE_CHAR          8
00208 #define M_STARCORE_SIZE_BYTE          8
00209 #define M_STARCORE_SIZE_SHORT        16
00210 #define M_STARCORE_SIZE_WORD         16
00211 #define M_STARCORE_SIZE_INT          32
00212 #define M_STARCORE_SIZE_LONG         32
00213 #define M_STARCORE_SIZE_FLOAT        32
00214 #define M_STARCORE_SIZE_DOUBLE       32
00215 #define M_STARCORE_SIZE_LONG_DOUBLE  32
00216 #define M_STARCORE_SIZE_POINTER      32
00217 #define M_STARCORE_SIZE_UNION        -1
00218 #define M_STARCORE_SIZE_STRUCT       -1
00219 #define M_STARCORE_SIZE_BLOCK        -1
00220 #define M_STARCORE_SIZE_MAX          32
00221 
00222 #define M_STARCORE_ALIGN_VOID        -1
00223 #define M_STARCORE_ALIGN_BIT          1
00224 #define M_STARCORE_ALIGN_CHAR         8
00225 #define M_STARCORE_ALIGN_SHORT       16
00226 #define M_STARCORE_ALIGN_INT         32
00227 #define M_STARCORE_ALIGN_LONG        32
00228 #define M_STARCORE_ALIGN_FLOAT       32
00229 #define M_STARCORE_ALIGN_DOUBLE      32
00230 #define M_STARCORE_ALIGN_LONG_DOUBLE 32
00231 #define M_STARCORE_ALIGN_POINTER     32
00232 #define M_STARCORE_ALIGN_UNION       -1 /* depends on the field */
00233 #define M_STARCORE_ALIGN_STRUCT      -1
00234 #define M_STARCORE_ALIGN_BLOCK       -1
00235 #define M_STARCORE_ALIGN_MAX         32

00244 
00245 /*
00246  * DALU Arithmetic op extensions
00247  */
00248 
00249 #define STARCOREop_VERSION         1
00250 #define STARCOREop_NON_INSTR    5001  /* Define, prologue, epilogue          */
00251 
00252 #define STARCOREop_ABS          1001  /* Absolute value                      */
00253 #define STARCOREop_ADC          1002  /* Add long with carry                 */
00254 #define STARCOREop_ADD          1003  /* Add                                 */
00255 #define STARCOREop_ADD2         1004  /* Add two 16-bit values               */
00256 #define STARCOREop_ADDNC_W      1005  /* Add without changing the carry      *
00257                                        * bit in the SR                       */
00258 #define STARCOREop_ADR          1006  /* Add and round                       */
00259 #define STARCOREop_ASL          1007  /* Arithmetic shift left by one bit    */
00260 #define STARCOREop_ASR          1008  /* Arithmetic shift right by one bit   */
00261 #define STARCOREop_CLR          1009  /* Clear                               */
00262 #define STARCOREop_CMPEQ        1010  /* Compare for equal                   */
00263 #define STARCOREop_CMPEQ_W_1    1011  /* Compare for equal using immediate   */
00264 #define STARCOREop_CMPEQ_W_2    1012  /* Compare for equal using immediate   */
00265 #define STARCOREop_CMPGT        1013  /* Compare for greater than            */
00266 #define STARCOREop_CMPGT_W_1    1014  /* Compare for greater than using      *
00267                                        * immediate                           */
00268 #define STARCOREop_CMPGT_W_2    1015  /* Compare for greater than using      *
00269                                        * immediate                           */
00270 #define STARCOREop_CMPHI        1016  /* Compare for higher (unsigned)       */
00271 #define STARCOREop_DECEQ        1017  /* Decrement a data register and set   *
00272                                        * T if zero                           */
00273 #define STARCOREop_DECGE        1018  /* Decrement a data register and set   *
00274                                        * T if greater than or equal to 0     */
00275 #define STARCOREop_DIV          1019  /* Divide iteration                    */
00276 #define STARCOREop_DMACSS       1020  /* Multiply signed by signed and       *
00277                                        * accumulate with data register right *
00278                                        * shifted by word size                */
00279 #define STARCOREop_DMACSU       1021  /* Multiply signed by unsigned and     *
00280                                        * accumulate with data register right *
00281                                        * shifted by word size                */
00282 #define STARCOREop_IADD         1022  /* Add integers                        */
00283 #define STARCOREop_IMAC         1023  /* Multiply-accumulate integers        */
00284 #define STARCOREop_IMACLHUU     1024  /* Multiply-accumulate unsigned        *
00285                                        * integers; first source from low     *
00286                                        * portion, second from high portion   */
00287 #define STARCOREop_IMACUS       1025  /* Multiply-accumulate unsigned integer*
00288                                        * and signed integer                  */
00289 #define STARCOREop_IMPY         1026  /* Multiply signed integers in data    *
00290                                        * registers                           */
00291 #define STARCOREop_IMPY_W       1027  /* Signed immediate integer multiply   */
00292 #define STARCOREop_IMPYHLUU     1028  /* Multiply unsigned integer and       *
00293                                        * unsigned integer; first source from *
00294                                        * high portion, second from low       *
00295                                        * portion                             */
00296 #define STARCOREop_IMPYSU       1029  /* Multiply signed integer and unsigned*
00297                                        * integer                             */
00298 #define STARCOREop_IMPYUU       1030  /* Multiply unsigned integer and       *
00299                                        * unsigned integer                    */
00300 #define STARCOREop_INC          1031  /* Increment a data register (as       *
00301                                        * integer data)                       */
00302 #define STARCOREop_INC_F        1032  /* Increment a data register (as       *
00303                                        * fractional data)                    */
00304 #define STARCOREop_MAC_1        1033  /* Multiply-accumulate signed          *
00305                                        * fractions                           */
00306 #define STARCOREop_MAC_2        1034  /* Multiply-accumulate signed          *
00307                                        * fractions                           */
00308 #define STARCOREop_MACR         1035  /* Multiply-accumulate signed          *
00309                                        * fractions and round                 */
00310 #define STARCOREop_MACSU        1036  /* Multiply-accumulate signed fraction *
00311                                        * and unsigned fraction               */
00312 #define STARCOREop_MACUS        1037  /* Multiply-accumulate unsigned        *
00313                                        * fraction and signed fraction        */
00314 #define STARCOREop_MACUU        1038  /* Multiply-accumulate unsigned        *
00315                                        * fraction and unsigned fraction      */
00316 #define STARCOREop_MAX          1039  /* Transfer maximum signed value       */
00317 #define STARCOREop_MAX2         1040  /* Transfer two 16-bit maximum signed  *
00318                                        * values                              */
00319 #define STARCOREop_MAX2VIT      1041  /* Special MAX2 version for Viterbi    *
00320                                        * kernel                              */
00321 #define STARCOREop_MAXM         1042  /* Transfer maximum magnitude value    */
00322 #define STARCOREop_MIN          1043  /* Transfer minimum signed value       */
00323 #define STARCOREop_MPY          1044  /* Multiply signed fractions           */
00324 #define STARCOREop_MPYR         1045  /* Multiply signed fractions and round */
00325 #define STARCOREop_MPYSU        1046  /* Multiply signed fraction and        *
00326                                        * unsigned fraction                   */
00327 #define STARCOREop_MPYUS        1047  /* Multiply unsigned fraction and      *
00328                                        * signed fraction                     */
00329 #define STARCOREop_MPYUU        1048  /* Multiply unsigned fraction and      *
00330                                        * unsigned fraction                   */
00331 #define STARCOREop_NEG          1049  /* Negate                              */
00332 #define STARCOREop_RND          1050  /* Round                               */
00333 #define STARCOREop_SAT_F        1051  /* Saturate fractional value in data   *
00334                                        * register to fit in high portion     */
00335 #define STARCOREop_SAT_L        1052  /* Saturate value in data register to  *
00336                                        * fit in 32 bits                      */
00337 #define STARCOREop_SBC          1053  /* Subtract long with carry            */
00338 #define STARCOREop_SBR          1054  /* Subtract and round                  */
00339 #define STARCOREop_SUB          1055  /* Subtract                            */
00340 #define STARCOREop_SUB2         1056  /* Subtract two words                  */
00341 #define STARCOREop_SUBL         1057  /* Shift left and subtract             */
00342 #define STARCOREop_SUBNC_W      1058  /* Subtract without changing the carry *
00343                                        * bit in the status register          */
00344 #define STARCOREop_TFR          1059  /* Transfer data register to a data    *
00345                                        * register                            */
00346 #define STARCOREop_TFRF         1060  /* Conditional data register transfer, *
00347                                        * if the T bit is clear               */
00348 #define STARCOREop_TFRT         1061  /* Conditional data register transfer, *
00349                                        * if the T bit is set                 */
00350 #define STARCOREop_TSTEQ        1062  /* Test for equal to 0                 */
00351 #define STARCOREop_TSTGE        1063  /* Test for greater than or equal to 0 */
00352 #define STARCOREop_TSTGT        1064  /* Test for greater than 0             */
00353 
00354 
00355 /*
00356  * DALU Logical op extensions
00357  */
00358 
00359 #define STARCOREop_AND_1        1101  /* Bitwise AND                         */
00360 #define STARCOREop_AND_2        1102  /* Bitwise AND                         */
00361 #define STARCOREop_AND_W_2      1103  /* Bitwise AND with 16-bit immediate   *
00362                                        * and operand from memory             */
00363 #define STARCOREop_AND_W_3      1104  /* Bitwise AND with 16-bit immediate   *
00364                                        * and operand from memory             */
00365 #define STARCOREop_ASLL         1105  /* Multi-bit arithmetic shift left     */
00366 #define STARCOREop_ASLW         1106  /* Word arithmetic shift left (16-bit  *
00367                                        * shift)                              */
00368 #define STARCOREop_ASRR         1107  /* Multi-bit arithmetic shift right    */
00369 #define STARCOREop_ASRW         1108  /* Word arithmetic shift right (16-bit *
00370                                        * shift)                              */
00371 #define STARCOREop_CLB          1109  /* Count leading bits (ones or zeros)  */
00372 #define STARCOREop_EOR_1        1110  /* Bitwise exclusive OR                */
00373 #define STARCOREop_EOR_2        1111  /* Bitwise exclusive OR                */
00374 #define STARCOREop_EOR_W_2      1112  /* Bitwise exclusive OR with 16-bit    *
00375                                        * immediate and operand from memory   */
00376 #define STARCOREop_EOR_W_3      1113  /* Bitwise exclusive OR with 16-bit    *
00377                                        * immediate and operand from memory   */
00378 #define STARCOREop_EXTRACT      1114  /* Extract signed bit field            */
00379 #define STARCOREop_EXTRACTU     1115  /* Extract unsigned bit field          */
00380 #define STARCOREop_INSERT       1116  /* Insert bit field                    */
00381 #define STARCOREop_LSLL         1117  /* Multi-bit logical shift left        */
00382 #define STARCOREop_LSR          1118  /* Logical shift right by one bit      */
00383 #define STARCOREop_LSRR         1119  /* Multi-bit logical shift right       */
00384 #define STARCOREop_LSRW         1120  /* Word logical shift right (16-bit    *
00385                                        * shift)                              */
00386 #define STARCOREop_NOT_1        1121  /* Binary inversion                    */
00387 #define STARCOREop_NOT_2        1122  /* Binary inversion                    */
00388 #define STARCOREop_NOT_W_2      1123  /* Binary inversion of a 16-bit        *
00389                                        * operand in memory                   */
00390 #define STARCOREop_NOT_W_3      1124  /* Binary inversion of a 16-bit        *
00391                                        * operand in memory                   */
00392 #define STARCOREop_OR_1         1125  /* Bitwise inclusive OR                */
00393 #define STARCOREop_OR_2         1126  /* Bitwise inclusive OR                */
00394 #define STARCOREop_OR_W_2       1127  /* Bitwise inclusive OR with 16-bit    *
00395                                        * immediate and operand from memory   */
00396 #define STARCOREop_OR_W_3       1128  /* Bitwise inclusive OR with 16-bit    *
00397                                        * immediate and operand from memory   */
00398 #define STARCOREop_ROL          1129  /* Rotate one bit left through the     *
00399                                        * carry bit                           */
00400 #define STARCOREop_ROR          1130  /* Rotate one bit right through the    *
00401                                        * carry bit                           */
00402 #define STARCOREop_SXT_B        1131  /* Sign extend byte                    */
00403 #define STARCOREop_SXT_L        1132  /* Sign extend long                    */
00404 #define STARCOREop_SXT_W        1133  /* Sign extend word                    */
00405 #define STARCOREop_ZXT_B        1134  /* Zero extend byte                    */
00406 #define STARCOREop_ZXT_L        1135  /* Zero extend long                    */
00407 #define STARCOREop_ZXT_W        1136  /* Zero extend word                    */
00408 
00409 
00410 /*
00411  * AGU Arithmetic op extensions
00412  */
00413 
00414 #define STARCOREop_ADDA_1       1201  /* Add (affected by the modifier mode) */
00415 #define STARCOREop_ADDA_2       1202  /* Add (affected by the modifier mode) */
00416 #define STARCOREop_ADDL1A       1203  /* Add with 1-bit left shift of source *
00417                                        * operand (affected by the modifier   *
00418                                        * mode)                               */
00419 #define STARCOREop_ADDL2A       1204  /* Add with 2-bit left shift of source *
00420                                        * operand (affected by the modifier   *
00421                                        * mode)                               */
00422 #define STARCOREop_ASL2A        1205  /* Arithmetic shift left by 2 bits     */
00423 #define STARCOREop_ASLA         1206  /* Arithmetic shift left by one bit    */
00424 #define STARCOREop_ASRA         1207  /* Arithmetic shift right (32-bit)     */
00425 #define STARCOREop_CMPEQA       1208  /* Compare for equal                   */
00426 #define STARCOREop_CMPGTA       1209  /* Compare for greater than            */
00427 #define STARCOREop_CMPHIA       1210  /* Compare for higher than (unsigned)  */
00428 #define STARCOREop_DECA         1211  /* Decrement register                  */
00429 #define STARCOREop_DECEQA       1212  /* Decrement and set T if zero         */
00430 #define STARCOREop_DECGEA       1213  /* Decrement and set T if equal or     *
00431                                        * greater than zero                   */
00432 #define STARCOREop_INCA         1214  /* Increment register                  */
00433 #define STARCOREop_LSRA         1215  /* Logical shift right (32-bit)        */
00434 #define STARCOREop_SUBA         1216  /* Subtract (affected by the modifier  *
00435                                        * mode)                               */
00436 #define STARCOREop_SXTA_B       1217  /* Sign extend byte                    */
00437 #define STARCOREop_SXTA_W       1218  /* Sign extend word                    */
00438 #define STARCOREop_TFRA         1219  /* Register transfer                   */
00439 #define STARCOREop_TSTEQA_L     1220  /* Test for equal                      */
00440 #define STARCOREop_TSTEQA_W     1221  /* Test for equal on lower 16 bits     */
00441 #define STARCOREop_TSTGEA       1222  /* Test for greater than or equal      */
00442 #define STARCOREop_TSTGTA       1223  /* Test for greater than               */
00443 #define STARCOREop_ZXTA_B       1224  /* Zero extend byte                    */
00444 #define STARCOREop_ZXTA_W       1225  /* Zero extend word                    */
00445 
00446 
00447 /*
00448  * Move op extensions
00449  */
00450 
00451 #define STARCOREop_MOVE_B_ST_1  1301  /* Move byte to memory                 */
00452 #define STARCOREop_MOVE_B_ST_2  1302  /* Move byte to memory                 */
00453 #define STARCOREop_MOVE_B_ST_3  1303  /* Move byte to memory                 */
00454 #define STARCOREop_MOVE_B_LD_1  1304  /* Move byte from memory               */
00455 #define STARCOREop_MOVE_B_LD_2  1305  /* Move byte from memory               */
00456 #define STARCOREop_MOVEU_B_LD_1 1306  /* Move unsigned byte from memory      */
00457 #define STARCOREop_MOVEU_B_LD_2 1307  /* Move unsigned byte from memory      */
00458 #define STARCOREop_MOVEU_B_LD_3 1308  /* Move unsigned byte from memory      */
00459 #define STARCOREop_MOVE_W_ST_1  1309  /* Move integer word to memory,        *
00460                                        * or immediate to memory              */
00461 #define STARCOREop_MOVE_W_ST_2  1310  /* Move integer word to memory,        *
00462                                        * or immediate to memory              */
00463 #define STARCOREop_MOVE_W_ST_3  1311  /* Move integer word to memory,        *
00464                                        * or immediate to memory              */
00465 #define STARCOREop_MOVE_W_LD_1  1312  /* Move integer word from memory       */
00466 #define STARCOREop_MOVE_W_LD_2  1313  /* Move integer word from memory       */
00467 #define STARCOREop_MOVE_W_LD_3  1314  /* Move integer word from memory       */
00468 #define STARCOREop_MOVE_W_MV_1  1315  /* Move immediate to register          */
00469 #define STARCOREop_MOVE_W_MV_2  1316  /* Move immediate to register          */
00470 #define STARCOREop_MOVEU_W_LD_1 1317  /* Move unsigned integer word from     *
00471                                        * memory                              */
00472 #define STARCOREop_MOVEU_W_LD_2 1318  /* Move unsigned integer word from     *
00473                                        * memory                              */
00474 #define STARCOREop_MOVEU_W_LD_3 1319  /* Move unsigned integer word from     *
00475                                        * memory                              */
00476 #define STARCOREop_MOVEU_W_MV   1320  /* Move unsigned integer word from     *
00477                                        * immediate                           */
00478 #define STARCOREop_MOVE_2W_ST   1321  /* Move two integer words to           *
00479                                        * memory from a register pair         */
00480 #define STARCOREop_MOVE_2W_LD   1322  /* Move two integer words from         *
00481                                        * memory to a register pair           */
00482 #define STARCOREop_MOVE_4W_ST   1323  /* Move four integer words to          *
00483                                        * memory from a register quad         */
00484 #define STARCOREop_MOVE_4W_LD   1324  /* Move four integer words from        *
00485                                        * memory to a register quad           */
00486 #define STARCOREop_MOVE_L_ST_1  1325  /* Move long to memory                 */
00487 #define STARCOREop_MOVE_L_ST_2  1326  /* Move long to memory                 */
00488 #define STARCOREop_MOVE_L_ST_3  1327  /* Move long to memory                 */
00489 #define STARCOREop_MOVE_L_LD_1  1328  /* Move long from memory               */
00490 #define STARCOREop_MOVE_L_LD_2  1329  /* Move long from memory               */
00491 #define STARCOREop_MOVE_L_LD_3  1330  /* Move long from memory               */
00492 #define STARCOREop_MOVE_L_MV_1  1331  /* Move long between registers or      *
00493                                        * immediates                          */
00494 #define STARCOREop_MOVE_L_MV_3  1332  /* Move long between registers or      *
00495                                        * immediates                          */
00496 #define STARCOREop_MOVEU_L_MV   1333  /* Move unsigned long from immediate   */
00497 #define STARCOREop_MOVES_L_ST   1334  /* Move long to memory with scaling    *
00498                                        * and limiting enabled                */
00499 #define STARCOREop_MOVE_2L_ST   1335  /* Move two longs from a register pair */
00500 #define STARCOREop_MOVE_2L_LD   1336  /* Move two longs to a register pair   */
00501 #define STARCOREop_MOVE_F_ST_1  1337  /* Move fractional word to memory      */
00502 #define STARCOREop_MOVE_F_LD_1  1338  /* Move fractional word from memory    */
00503 #define STARCOREop_MOVE_F_LD_2  1339  /* Move fractional word from memory    */
00504 #define STARCOREop_MOVE_F_LD_3  1340  /* Move fractional word from memory    */
00505 #define STARCOREop_MOVE_F_MV_2  1341  /* Move fractional word to/from        *
00506                                        * registers                           */
00507 #define STARCOREop_MOVES_F_ST_1 1342  /* Move fractional word to memory with *
00508                                        * scaling and limiting enabled        */
00509 #define STARCOREop_MOVES_F_ST_2 1343  /* Move fractional word to memory with *
00510                                        * scaling and limiting enabled        */
00511 #define STARCOREop_MOVES_F_ST_3 1344  /* Move fractional word to memory with *
00512                                        * scaling and limiting enabled        */
00513 #define STARCOREop_MOVE_2F_LD   1345  /* Move two fractional words from      *
00514                                        * memory to a register pair           */
00515 #define STARCOREop_MOVES_2F_ST  1346  /* Move two fractional words to memory *
00516                                        * with scaling and limiting enabled   */
00517 #define STARCOREop_MOVE_4F_LD   1347  /* Move four fractional words from     *
00518                                        * memory to a register quad           */
00519 #define STARCOREop_MOVES_4F_ST  1348  /* Move four fractional words to memory*
00520                                        * with scaling and limiting enabled   */
00521 #define STARCOREop_MOVET        1349  /* Move address register to address    *
00522                                        * register if T-bit is 1              */
00523 #define STARCOREop_MOVEF        1350  /* Move address register to address    *
00524                                        * register if T-bit is 0              */
00525 #define STARCOREop_VSL_4W       1351  /* Viterbi shift left: special move    *
00526                                        * for Viterbi kernel                  */
00527 #define STARCOREop_VSL_4F       1352  /* Viterbi shift left: special move    *
00528                                        * for Viterbi kernel                  */

00530                                        * for Viterbi kernel                  */

00532                                        * for Viterbi kernel                  */

00536  * Stack Support op extensions

00539 #define STARCOREop_POP          1401  /* Pop a register from the software    *
00540                                        * stack                               */
00541 #define STARCOREop_POPN         1402  /* Pop a register from the software    *
00542                                        * stack using the normal stack        *
00543                                        * pointer                             */
00544 #define STARCOREop_PUSH         1403  /* Push a register onto the software   *
00545                                        * stack                               */
00546 #define STARCOREop_PUSHN        1404  /* Push a register onto the software   *
00547                                        * stack using the normal stack        *
00548                                        * pointer                             */
00549 #define STARCOREop_TFRA_OSP     1405  /* Move the "other" stack pointer      *
00550                                        * to/from a register, inversely       *
00551                                        * defined by the exception mode       */

00560                                        * memory                              */
00561 #define STARCOREop_BMCHG_W_3    1503  /* Bit-mask change a 16-bit operand in *

00574                                        * operand                             */
00575 #define STARCOREop_BMTSET_W_2   1511  /* Bit-mask test and set a 16-bit      *
00576                                        * operand in memory                   */
00577 #define STARCOREop_BMTSET_W_3   1512  /* Bit-mask test and set a 16-bit      *
00578                                        * operand in memory                   */
00579 #define STARCOREop_BMTSTC       1513  /* Bit-mask test if clear - Sets the   *
00580                                        * T-bit if every bit position that has*
00581                                        * the value 1 in the mask is 0 in     *
00582                                        * an operand                          */
00583 #define STARCOREop_BMTSTC_W_2   1514  /* Bit-mask test if clear - Sets the   *

00585                                        * the value 1 in the mask is 0 in     *
00586                                        * an operand in memory                */
00587 #define STARCOREop_BMTSTC_W_3   1515  /* Bit-mask test if clear - Sets the   *
00588                                        * T-bit if every bit position that has*
00589                                        * the value 1 in the mask is 0 in     *
00590                                        * an operand in memory                */

00592                                        * T-bit if every bit position that has*
00593                                        * the value 1 in the mask is 1 in     *
00594                                        * an operand                          */

00602                                        * an operand in memory                */

00652  * Loop op extensions
00653  */
00654 
00655 #define STARCOREop_DOSETUP0     1701  /* Setup loop start address 0          */
00656 #define STARCOREop_DOSETUP1     1702  /* Setup loop start address 1          */
00657 #define STARCOREop_DOSETUP2     1703  /* Setup loop start address 2          */
00658 #define STARCOREop_DOSETUP3     1704  /* Setup loop start address 3          */
00659 #define STARCOREop_DOEN0        1705  /* Do enable - set loop counter 0 and  *
00660                                        * enable loop 0 as a long loop        */
00661 #define STARCOREop_DOEN1        1706  /* Do enable - set loop counter 1 and  *
00662                                        * enable loop 1 as a long loop        */
00663 #define STARCOREop_DOEN2        1707  /* Do enable - set loop counter 2 and  *
00664                                        * enable loop 2 as a long loop        */
00665 #define STARCOREop_DOEN3        1708  /* Do enable - set loop counter 3 and  *
00666                                        * enable loop 3 as a long loop        */
00667 #define STARCOREop_DOENSH0      1709  /* Do enable short - set loop counter 0*
00668                                        * and enable loop 0 as a short loop   */
00669 #define STARCOREop_DOENSH1      1710  /* Do enable short - set loop counter 1*
00670                                        * and enable loop 1 as a short loop   */
00671 #define STARCOREop_DOENSH2      1711  /* Do enable short- set loop counter 2 *
00672                                        * and enable loop 2 as a short loop   */
00673 #define STARCOREop_DOENSH3      1712  /* Do enable short- set loop counter 3 *
00674                                        * and enable loop 3 as a short loop   */
00675 #define STARCOREop_SKIPLS       1713  /* Test the active LC and skip the loop*
00676                                        * if LCn is equal or smaller than 0   */
00677 #define STARCOREop_BREAK        1714  /* Terminate the loop and branch to an *
00678                                        * address                             */
00679 #define STARCOREop_CONT         1715  /* Jump to the start of the loop to    *
00680                                        * start the next iteration            */
00681 #define STARCOREop_CONTD        1716  /* Jump to the start of the loop to    *
00682                                        * start the next iteration (delayed)  */
00683 #define STARCOREop_LPMARKA      1717  /* End-of-loop mark                    */
00684 #define STARCOREop_LPMARKB      1718  /* End-of-loop mark                    */
00685 
00686 
00687 /*
00688  * Program Control op extensions
00689  */
00690 
00691 #define STARCOREop_NOP          1801  /* No operation                        */
00692 #define STARCOREop_IFA          1802  /* Execute current execution set or    *
00693                                        * subgroup unconditionally            */
00694 #define STARCOREop_IFF          1803  /* Execute current execution set or    *
00695                                        * subgroup if the T bit is clear      */
00696 #define STARCOREop_IFT          1804  /* Execute current execution set or    *
00697                                        * subgroup if the T bit is set        */
00698 #define STARCOREop_DI           1805  /* Disable interrupts (sets the DI bit *
00699                                        * in the status register              */
00700 #define STARCOREop_EI           1806  /* Enable interrupts (clears the DI bit*
00701                                        * in the status register)             */
00702 #define STARCOREop_WAIT         1807  /* Wait for interrupt (low power       *
00703                                        * stand-by)                           */
00704 #define STARCOREop_STOP         1808  /* Stop processing (lowest power       *
00705                                        * stand-by)                           */
00706 #define STARCOREop_TRAP         1809  /* Execute a precise software exception*/
00707 #define STARCOREop_ILLEGAL      1810  /* Trigger an imprecise illegal        *
00708                                        * instruction exception               */
00709 #define STARCOREop_DEBUG        1811  /* Enter debug mode                    */
00710 #define STARCOREop_DEBUGEV      1812  /* Signal debug event                  */
00711 #define STARCOREop_MARK         1813  /* Push the PC into the trace buffer   */
